alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued April 25 at 3:31PM EDT until April 26 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 35 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...In Kentucky, Greenup, Carter, Boyd and Lawrence KY Counties. In Ohio, Lawrence OH County. In Virginia, Dickenson and Buchanan Counties. In West Virginia, Wayne, Mingo and McDowell Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Better protected valley locations could see a period of sub-freezing temperatures heading into Thursday morning. If you live in a typical cold spot, consider taking additional precautions to protect sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
